Plot: A hefty homeboy borrows his dad's Mercedes and goes to the beach with his friends for wild sun & fun.
Title: Phat Beach
Writer: Cleveland O'Neal III (story), Brian E. O'Neal (story), Doug Ellin (screenplay), Brian E. O'Neal (screenplay), Ben Morris (screenplay)
Actors: Jermaine 'Huggy' Hopkins, Claudia Kaleem, Candice Merideth, Alma Collins
